dict.string: An Alfred workflow for DeepL translation and rewrite
Open input textbox in default browser
Show number of characters translated so far

require './alfred-deepl.rb'
params = ARGV[0].split(/\s+/, 4)
formality = "default"
mode = params[0] source_lang = params[1] target_lang = params[2] original_text = params[3]
if /\A(default|more|less|prefer_more|prefer_less)\s+(.*)\z/ =~ original_text formality = $1 original_text = $2 end
text, context = original_text.split("[CONTEXT]") text ||= "" context ||= ""
execute_query(original_text: text, auth_key: ENV["authkey"], primary_lang: source_lang, secondary_lang: target_lang, mode: mode, show_original_text: ENV["show_original_text"], max_characters: ENV["max_characters"], split_sentences: ENV["split_sentences"], preserve_formatting: ENV["preserve_formatting"], formality: formality, context: ENV["context"] )

TEXT_WIDTH = ENV['ja_text_width']
result = [] paragraph = `pbpaste` paragraph.gsub!(/"/, '"') paragraph = paragraph.to_s.gsub(/
?/, "
").split(/

+/) hankaku = Regexp.new("[ -~｡-ﾟ]") paragraph.each do |para| if /[。、．，]/ =~ para newary = [] lines = para.split(/
/) lines.each do |line| ary = line.scan(/.{1,#{TEXT_WIDTH}}/) ary.each_cons(2) do |pair| if hankaku =~ pair[0].split(//)[-1] and hankaku =~ pair[1].split(//)[0] newary << pair[0].sub(/\s+$/, "") + " " else newary << pair[0] end end newary << ary[-1] end result << newary.join("
") else result << para end end print result.join("

").gsub('"', '"')
Translate language A to B and vice versa

require './alfred-deepl.rb'
original_text =<<~TEXT {query} TEXT
execute_query(original_text: original_text, auth_key: ENV["authkey"], mode: ENV["mode"], primary_lang: ENV["primary_lang"], secondary_lang: ENV["secondary_lang"], show_original_text: ENV["show_original_text"], max_characters: ENV["max_characters"], split_sentences: ENV["split_sentences"], preserve_formatting: ENV["preserve_formatting"], formality: ENV["formality"], context: ENV["context"] )
❗️ ERROR: both primary_lang and secondary_lang keys must be set
Translate text (press ⌘ to rewrite / ^ to show original)
❗️ ERROR: both primary_lang and secondary_lang keys must be set

require 'open-uri'
github_url = ENV["github_repo"].strip
/(?:https:\/\/)?github\.com\/([^\/]+)\/([^\/]+)\/?/ =~ github_url
exit if !$1 || !$2
app_name = $2
remote_version_file = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/#{$1}/#{$2}/main/version.txt"
begin latest_version = URI.open(remote_version_file).read.strip rescue `osascript <<END display dialog "Github repository for #{app_name} is currently unreacheable. Try sometime later." with title "Update Check Failed" buttons {"OK"} END` exit end
current_version = ENV["alfred_workflow_version"].strip
if latest_version != current_version `osascript <<END display dialog "A new version of #{app_name} (#{latest_version}) is available. Would you like to download the latest version?" with title "New version available" buttons {"Download", "Cancel"} default button 1 if button returned of result is "Download" then open location "#{github_url}" end if END` else `osascript <<END display dialog "#{app_name} (#{current_version}) is currently the newest version available." with title "You are up to date!" buttons {"OK"} END` end
Chech availability of new version of {const:alfred_workflow_name}

export LANG=ja_JP.UTF-8
docid=$1 dockey=$2
ruby alfred-deepl-download.rb $authkey $docid $dockey
Translation file has been downloaded to: {query}
Translate text (press ⌘ to rewrite / ^ to show original)
❗️ ERROR: both primary_lang and secondary_lang keys must be set

# DeepL Translate/Rewrite Workflow
![](icon-mini.png)
An Alfred workflow to help translate and rewrite text using DeepL API
Check out the [README](https://github.com/yohasebe/deepl-alfred-translate-rewrite-workflow) on the GitHub repository of this workflow.
Hotkey for DeepL Translate (with original text)
Hotkey for DeepL Rewrite (with original text)
Hotkey for opening a page with a textbox in default browser
